titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. David Owens, Judgment
CWG6734

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Pulaski Circuit Court
July Term 1865
The Commonwealth of Ky Pltff
against } Judgment
David Owens Deft
This day the Defendant David Owens appeared in Open Court and confessed a Judgment in the above Styled cause for the Sum of $10= and costs
It is ^adjudged &^ Ordered by the Court that the Pltff recover of the defendant David Owens the Sum of Ten dollars fine and the costs herein Expended for which his body may be taken &C

A Copy attest
J. E. Cosson C P C C
And after wards David Owens paid me the Judgt above Ten dollars and its costs

p.hi: J. E. Cosson C P Circuit Court

body.p:
Commonwealth
vs } Copy of Judgment
David Owens
